56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Umar:I heard the Prophet (ﷺ) saying. "Evil omen is in three things: The horse, the woman and the house

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُذْكَرُ مِنْ شُؤْمِ الْفَرَسِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been said about the evil omen of a horse
